topic.title: Binary Transparency
topic.body:
Binary transparency is related to binary executable files, for more info you can google split-view attack (a.k.a. split-world attack)
I wish [this guy](https://twitter.com/BinTraDirectory) to do some work on it. I think if we increase his followers  it would encourage him. it passed some time without activity
It has a website too: https://bintra.directory but registration is not working

I hope my post doesn't cause that he would be contacted by a government to make a deal and stop working

topic.title: Comparison of Decentralized Social Media
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:comparison-decentralized-social-media
Please complete it especially if you know other decentralized (blockchain) socials that support "group".

topic.title: Immutable archive for firmware, ROMs, device drivers, software
topic.body:
An attempt for stopping split-view attack. In below page for every file you can create a post and enter it's official download link, checksum, magnet URI, google drive ... 

Page: https://discussions.app/c/binary_archive (On Telso blockchain)

~~Sapien is blockchain based and support "group" so I selected it. If you have better option tell me
https://app.sapien.network/t/binary_archive
Note 1: You have to register to see the link
Note 2: I'm not sure but from past I think the notification is not working~~
Note: Sapien is very slow and I think it is not indexed by google, too.

1634478504_15PEof54VQE7mki8G8hYa5FgkCgpY.body:
Also a fork of this d-app that support proprietary software, too could help:
http://quiark.github.io/AuditDog (Abandoned)

> [cyberk1d](#comment_1_148jFFH43GX5qkcpTXmeRiTaYJahpiWrSW): I like the idea, but given the email and phone verification on sapien.network it's probably not the best repository for potentially "illegal" content.

Phone verification is optional (for monetization). See my update I suggested an alternative

1633740636_1GvDe5pkKGgM4ZXSge4CwhekmWCjp.body:
For anonymous internet access Lokinet is best option
https://oxen.io
https://lokinet.org

> [xanadu](#comment_35_1JTx34tPsJsZT8WWGEih4c8kxeY2kk89gH): Nah It's another crypto scam :)

Lokinet is one of few project in d-apps area that is fully open (and ready for use)
What is your reason for your opinion? because currently only one that I can think of is being member of china cyber army

> [doctorforesight](#comment_3_1Hiqq5zy6pScwUbR3wzLL2MrprBEDBfK9z): Better than Zeronet?
No and Yes 
Lokinet provide anonymous clean-net access but ZeroNet can't be used for cleannet (Comparing to similar projects like Freenet or Maid network, ZeroNet has weaker anonymity even in its network)
However ZeroNet has CMS and distributed storage, Lokinet (and I2P) have not. Freenet has them (it has a social media plugin which can be used similar to CMS) but very unusable due to installation error and other problems - I failed to use it)

1636121680_12sCaEUFqE6g3JrDqmEA8pn9yrgxw.body: ZeroNet protocol is viewed same as BitTorrent protocol by government surveillance. Why it needed to be replaced?

> [6283822](#comment_127_12sCaEUFqE6g3JrDqmEA8pn9yrgxwkZQMe): It's a new decentralised network with better features, network layer and lesser resource consumption, it can be compiled to IOT device level chips to servers, that may not be possible with current zeronet code.

Great
